content: this crochet pattern is very easy to follow and creates the most beautiful and easy scrunchie with a lovely feminine vibe it s super beginner friendly and can be made up in the space of just under an hour for this project you will need 1 skein of chunky monkey yarn by scheepjes or any other chunky/size 5 yarn of your preference a 6 mm crochet hook a tapestry needle a pair of scissors 1 basic elastic band medium thickness this pattern is written in us terms with british terms in brackets this is a great project for beginners
